Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.objects

Class Lazy<Value>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.objects.Lazy<Value>
  • Type Parameters:
    Value - The type of value to create
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loadable, Unloadable
    public class Lazy<Value>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loadable, Unloadable
    A lazy-initializing value. Given a factory that creates a value, only creates the object when get() is called. After that the value is cached and get() will return the same value. clear() can be used to clear the value and force it to be re-created in the future.

    Example 

      private static final Lazy<EdgeAttributes> singleton =
      new Lazy<>(EdgeAttributes::new);
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
